articles.title: Video: Michael Cohen predicts Trump's next move following Mar-a-Lago search - CNN Video
articles.description: Micheal Cohen, Donald Trump's former personal attorney, tells CNN's Don Lemon what he predicts the former president's next move will be following the FBI search at Mar-a-Lago.

articles.title: Analysis: Cheney's fate in Wyoming is a final test of Trump's hold over the GOP

articles.title: Video: Leon Panetta says Trump's claim about Mar-a-Lago documents is 'pretty much BS' - CNN Video
articles.description: Leon Panetta, who served as Secretary of Defense and CIA director in the Obama administration, refutes a claim by former President Donald Trump's allies that a president can declassify whatever documents they choose.

articles.author: Opinion by Dean Obeidallah
articles.title: Opinion: Once a proud law and order party, the GOP is taking aim at the FBI
articles.description: Republicans have been quick to defend former President Donald Trump after the FBI carried out a court-authorized search of his Mar-a-Lago property, but Dean Obeidallah wants to know where the GOP's outrage is over threats to the bureau.
articles.content: Dean Obeidallah, a former attorney, is the host of SiriusXM radio's daily program "The Dean Obeidallah Show" and a columnist for The Daily Beast. Follow him @DeanObeidallah. The opinions expressed in… [+5359 chars]

articles.title: DOJ opposes making public details in Mar-a-Lago search warrant's probable cause affidavit

articles.title: Opinion: Trump is worried after FBI search -- and he should be

articles.author: Analysis by Stephen Collinson, CNN
articles.title: Analysis: Republicans pressure Garland as intrigue deepens over search of Trump home
articles.description: The FBI's stunning search of ex-President Donald Trump's home triggered a legal and political earthquake whose aftershocks are only widening a week on, with key questions that will shape the nation's future still clouded in mystery.
